title: Why doesn't Oceania have a tribunal???
body: I realise that Oceania has less resources at it's disposal that NA or EUW. But surely it's possible to set up a small server for tribunal and have a slower system? I would gladly suffer through a little delay if it means we could actually punish the consistently toxic and negative members of the community. One in ten games I play are just upsetting, as someone screams at the team or pretends to be a victim etc etc. So what's Riots view on an actual tribunal system? Does anyone know? Please get back to me on this! Thanks!

replies.body:
Hi DarkLorde177,

Check out [this post](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/tribunal-oce) from Lyte on the tribunal.  It is from last year, but is still relevant today.

The TL;DR is that the Tribunal is not up and running in any region, and we have quite a few other systems in place to encourage positive behaviour.

Cheers
Mindstar
*Still doesn't explain why we can't have a basic version of it.*
